hero.title: More energy for your family and yourself
hero.subtitle: For busy parents and professionals who want to get fit again, without judgment and with guidance at your level. No experience needed, we'll teach you everything step by step.
hero.ctaNote: ðŸ‘‰ No workout, just a conversation. Discover if CrossFit Leiden is right for you.

why.title: Why CrossFit Leiden?
why.subtitle: We understand you're busy and maybe haven't exercised in years. That's why we make it easy.
why.usp1Text: Our coaches know your name, watch your technique, and guide you step by step. You're never just a number.
why.usp2Text: You don't need to be fit to start. We adjust everything to your level â€“ whether you're 35 or 55.
why.usp3Text: Train with other parents and professionals. Here you support and encourage each other â€“ no judgment, only support.
why.usp4Text: Injury prevention comes first. We teach you the right technique so you get stronger safely, without risk.
why.usp5Text: From early morning to late evening â€“ there's always a class that fits. Classes last 1 hour, including warm-up.

howItWorks.title: How does it work?
howItWorks.subtitle: Three simple steps â€“ no commitments, no pressure. Just getting to know each other.
howItWorks.step1Text: Click the button, choose a time that suits you and fill in your details. Takes 30 seconds.
howItWorks.step2Text: We get to know you, answer all your questions and show you our box. In this conversation we also explain the Kickstart program and see if it fits you. You don't have to work out â€“ just coffee and a chat.
howItWorks.step2Note: ðŸ’¡ We call this a "No Sweat Intro" â€“ literally: no sweating!
howItWorks.step3Text: If it clicks, we create a plan together that fits your goals and schedule. Want to think about it? That's fine!

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: We get these questions often. Do you recognize yourself?
faq.q1: Am I fit enough to start CrossFit?
faq.a1: Absolutely! You don't need to be fit to start. 80% of our members had no sports experience when they started. We adjust every exercise to your level â€“ whether you haven't exercised in 20 years or are quite active.
faq.a2: We recommend 2â€“3 times per week for good results. How often you can come depends on your membership: up to 6 times per week. Focus on quality and consistency, not extreme hours.
faq.q3: Isn't CrossFit dangerous? I don't want injuries...
faq.a3p1: Understandable concern! But precisely because of our coaching, CrossFit is much safer than working out alone. We teach you the right technique with light weights first. Only when your movement is good do we progress. Injury prevention is our priority.
faq.a3p2: We partner with Fysiofabriek, a professional physiotherapy practice with their own treatment room in our gym. This allows us to act quickly with aches, rehabilitation or advice.
faq.q4: Am I not too old to start?
faq.a4: Not at all! Our members are between 20 and 65 years old, with most between 35-50. CrossFit is perfect for "older" beginners because we adjust everything to your body and goals. You're never too old to get stronger and healthier!
faq.q5: I really don't have time, with work and kids...
faq.a5: We understand! That's why our classes last exactly 1 hour (including warm-up and cool-down). Our classes run from 06:00 to 22:00, so there's always a time that fits. Many members come before work, during lunch break or in the evening when the kids are in bed.
faq.q6: What happens during the Free Intro?
faq.a6: The intro lasts 20-30 minutes. We get to know you, talk about your goals and concerns, show you the box and answer all your questions. You do NOT have to work out during this intro â€“ just getting to know each other. Afterwards we create a plan together if you want to continue. No commitments, no pressure!

footerCta.title: Can you see yourself training here?
footerCta.subtitle: Schedule your free intro â€“ it's non-binding, takes 20 minutes and you don't have to work out. Just get to know each other and see if it clicks. We're looking forward to meeting you!
footerCta.button: Yes, I want to meet you!

hero.title: Train with us at CrossFit Leiden
hero.subtitle: In the area or want to try our box? Book a drop-in and join at your level. For experienced CrossFitters only.

howItWorks.title: How does it work?
howItWorks.step1Text: First select the location CrossFit Leiden in SportBit. Then choose from two class options:
howItWorks.step1Option1: "Training" (regular CrossFit WOD) â€“ drop-in fee â‚¬30
howItWorks.step1Option2: "HYROX Training" â€“ â‚¬30 for 60 minutes, â‚¬35 for 90 minutes
howItWorks.step1Note: Other classes are not available for drop-ins.
howItWorks.step2Text: Available times appear in the calendar. Fill in your details, accept the terms and pay directly when booking. No cash or card payment at the gym.
howItWorks.step3Text: Check in with the coach. Tour depends on how busy the class is.

practicalInfo.title: Practical Info
practicalInfo.priceNote: Payment is made directly when booking via SportBit. No cash or card.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Can I do a drop-in as a beginner?
faq.a1: No. Drop-ins are only for people with CrossFit experience. Completely new? Schedule a free intro first.
faq.a2: Depending on the class, 30 to 35 euros. Payment is made online during booking.
faq.a3: HYROX Training is often more accessible due to less technical movements and more cardio. Training (WOD) varies per day. It can be strength, technique or cardio. Both options are suitable for experienced athletes.
faq.q4: Do I need to book in advance?
faq.a4: Yes. You must always book in advance via the drop-in calendar so we can guarantee a spot for you.

cta.title: Ready to train with us?
cta.subtitle: Book your drop-in and experience the CrossFit Leiden atmosphere!

hero.title: Contact
hero.subtitle: Have questions or want to visit? We'd love to hear from you!

route.title: Directions & Parking
route.byCar: By car: Ample parking in front (including disabled parking spot). â‚¬0.20 per hour from 07:30 - 19:30 on Mon-Fri. Free parking the rest of the time.
route.byBike: By bike: Leiden Central Station is 10 minutes cycling. Leiden Lammerschans Station is 3 minutes cycling.
route.byPublicTransport: By public transport: Bus stop 800 meters away.

welcome.title: Feel free to drop by!
welcome.text: Feel free to drop by to get a feel for the atmosphere. You'll find us on the south side of the sports complex with our own entrance. Coffee is ready. â˜•
welcome.introQuestion: Want to schedule a free intro right away?

hero.title: Everyday people, exceptional results
hero.subtitle: CrossFit Leiden is a place where busy parents, young professionals, students, expats, and people who haven't exercised in years get stronger together. No judgment, no pressure. Just training and growing together.

whyDifferent.title: Why CrossFit Leiden is different
whyDifferent.p1: We're not your typical gym. CrossFit Leiden was founded on a simple idea: everyone should feel welcome to exercise, regardless of age, fitness level, or experience.
whyDifferent.p2: No macho culture or intimidating atmosphere. Here you train alongside parents who come after putting the kids to bed, young professionals who come before work, students picking up a barbell for the first time, expats looking for a new community, and people who haven't exercised in 10 or 20 years. Members specifically training for Hyrox or seeking extra challenge also find their place here. Everyone starts somewhere, and we'll help you along the way.
whyDifferent.p3: We understand how it feels to have doubts: "Am I fit enough?", "Do I have time?", "Will I fit in?" The answer is always: yes! Our community is built on support, not judgment. Here we know each other's names, celebrate each other's successes (big or small), and encourage each other.
whyDifferent.p4: We don't just train in the gym. We also tackle challenges together outside the box: Hyrox events, runs, outdoor challenges, and trips. The gym is the means, but the goal is for you to stand stronger and more confident in your life.

story.title: The story behind CrossFit Leiden
story.p1: I'm Jeroen, founder of CrossFit Leiden.
story.p2: Before I started this gym, I worked in an office as a business controller at Samsung. I sat behind a desk all day, felt increasingly unfit, gained weight, and noticed my confidence slowly fading. I wasn't deeply unhappy, but I felt very clearly: this isn't for me.
story.p3: Around 2013, I saw a video online of someone doing CrossFit. Someone training with complete confidence. I felt immediately: that's what I'm missing. Shortly after, I started training, first at CrossFit Bink and later at Gymbox Noordwijk. Slowly everything changed. I got stronger, fitter, and especially much more confident in my body. That energy also spread to my girlfriend, now my wife.
story.p4: At a certain point I knew: I don't just want to improve numbers in Excel, I want to help people feel better in their own bodies. In 2016, together with Kees Houwaart, owner of Gymbox Noordwijk, I started CrossFit Leiden.
story.p5: Since then, we've been able to help over 3,000 people. We've learned so much, heard so many stories, and built a community that I'm proud to walk into every day.
story.p6: Now I'm a father of two children and I see even more clearly how important it is for people to stay strong and healthy. We live in a time when we need builders: people with energy, resilience, and joy in what they do. I want CrossFit Leiden to be a positive beacon in the city. A place where energy starts and spreads to families, businesses, and the streets of Leiden.
story.p7: That's why our mission is very concrete: over the next ten years, we want to help about ten people start safely in Leiden every month. That's about 120 new members per year, and ultimately around 1,200 families and approximately 4,800 people we help to stand stronger, more positive, and more energetic in life.
story.p8: We don't do this with quick tricks, but with good coaching, a strong community, and workouts you can sustain. In the gym we build strength and confidence, so you dare more outside: tackle new challenges, go on adventures, grow professionally, or simply run after your kids with joy again.
story.p9: CrossFit Leiden is the means for that. A second living room where you feel seen, where you get to know each other, and where you walk out a little stronger every week than you walked in.

mission.title: Our mission
mission.statement: Over the next 10 years, we want to help 4,800 people become stronger, more positive, and more energetic.

community.title: Community > Competition
community.text: We're not a competition gym. Here you train together, encourage each other, and celebrate each other's progress. Friendship comes first.

everyone.title: Everyone Welcome
everyone.text: Whether you're 25 or 55, fit or not, experienced or beginner â€“ you're welcome here as you are. We adapt to you.
everyone.list1: â€¢ Busy parents training between work and family
everyone.list3: â€¢ Expats looking for their community
everyone.list4: â€¢ People who haven't exercised in 10-20 years
everyone.list5: â€¢ Members wanting Hyrox or extra challenge

personal.title: Personal Attention
personal.text: You're not a number with us. Our coaches know your name, your goals, and your challenges. We guide you personally.
personal.list1: â€¢ Small group training for extra guidance
personal.list2: â€¢ Beginner programs to start safely
personal.list3: â€¢ Coaches who think along and adapt

cta.title: Want to get to know us?
cta.subtitle: Schedule a free intro and meet our team, see the box, and experience the atmosphere. No workout, just getting to know each other over coffee. We look forward to meeting you!

hero.title: Our Programs
hero.subtitle: From regular group classes to special programs â€“ we have something for everyone. Every program is fully adaptable to your level, experience, and goals.

intro.title: Where do you want to start?
intro.subtitle: New to training? No problem â€“ our group classes are perfect to start. Already experienced or looking for something specific? Then our special programs might be for you!

kickstart.title: Kickstart Program
kickstart.description: Perfect for beginners! 4-week intensive onboarding where you learn everything about CrossFit in small groups. After completion, you're ready for group classes.

groupClasses.title: CrossFit Group Classes
groupClasses.description: The foundation and favorite of 90% of our members. Train together in a group where everyone encourages each other. Perfect for beginners and advanced!
groupClasses.ctaLink: Or schedule a free intro right away â†’

personal.title: Personal Training
personal.description: 1-on-1 guidance for specific goals, injuries, or if you want extra attention. Your coach, your training, your pace.

special.title: Special Programs
special.subtitle: Looking for something specific? These programs combine group classes with extra focus on specific goals.

smallGroup.title: Small Group Training
smallGroup.description: Train with max 5 people and get a customized program. Includes GetShredded and Unlock Motion.

hyrox.title: HYROX Training
hyrox.description: Preparation for Hyrox races. Combined conditioning and strength training for this popular event.

fysiofabriek.title: Fysiofabriek
fysiofabriek.description: Professional physiotherapy and rehabilitation. Specialized guidance for injuries and pain.

nutrition.title: Nutrition
nutrition.description: 80% of results come from nutrition. Learn to eat healthy without strict diets. For busy people!

youth.title: For Young Athletes
youth.subtitle: Because fit kids become fit adults. Our youth programs are specially designed for different age groups.

preTeens.title: Pre-teens (8-12 years)
preTeens.description: Learning to move in a fun, playful way. Basic techniques and group dynamics.

teens.title: Teens (13-17 years)
teens.description: Building strength and conditioning in a safe environment. Focus on technique and healthy habits.

sportPerformance.title: Sport & Performance
sportPerformance.description: For young athletes who want to improve in their sport. Functional conditioning.

schedule.title: Flexible Schedule
schedule.subtitle: We offer multiple class times daily, from early morning to late evening. There's always a time that fits you!

whyUs.title: Why CrossFit Leiden?
whyUs.subtitle: What makes our training different from a regular gym?
whyUs.feature1: Small groups (max 12 people) â€“ No massive gyms where you're on your own. Here you get personal attention.
whyUs.feature2: Professional coaching â€“ Every class is led by certified coaches who improve your technique and motivate you.
whyUs.feature3: Functional movements â€“ We train movements that also help you in daily life (lifting, bending, carrying, running).
whyUs.feature4: Variety â€“ Every day is different. You never get bored and your body stays challenged.
whyUs.feature5: Community â€“ You don't train alone, but with a group that supports and motivates each other. That makes the difference!

cta.title: Still hesitating?
cta.subtitle: Schedule a free intro and experience yourself why so many people train here. No obligations, just getting to know each other and seeing if it's a fit!
